title: Folding
subTitle: The design does not align with the folded product
action:
Open the proof in Adobe Acrobat
Open clear customer evidence
Compare the product fold to the magenta vertical dotted line in the proof file.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

options.action:
Place the cPDF on the template linked to the DTP tab. 
Compare if the supplier ID on the template matches the supplier ID on the DTP tab.
Unsure how to, send a ticket to artwork_complaints using the macro artwork complaint

question.text: Correct supplier template linked on Presta?

solution.title: Folding
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Inform Rafael to update the template
Reprocess on the correct template

questions.title: Correct supplier template linked on Presta?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The incorrect template was linked to Presta which caused the file not to match the suppliers fold lines.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: We realised we used an incorrect template for this product, which caused your file to be folded incorrectly. We can reprint the order based on the correct template. If a reprint is no longer feasible, we can offer a discount on this order or issue a full refund. Please let us know your preferred option.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Process Complaint Type: Incorrect Template/Spec

options.action:
Check if the cPDF fits the template. 
Double check fold lines & bleed zone.
Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: 'Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by.

solution.title: Folding
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Reprocess the file correctly to the template
Send an 'Artwork Altered' warning

questions.title: Correct supplier template linked on Presta?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The agent did not match the file to the template causing the folds to be displaced on the final product.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: Our artwork agent did not align the file correctly with the template, resulting in displaced folds on the final product. We can reprint the order with the correct alignment. If a reprint is no longer feasible, we can offer a discount on this order or issue a full refund. Please let us know your preferred option.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Manual Checked Complaint Type: Incorrectly processed

solution.title: Folding
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Reprocess the file correctly to the template
Send the order number to Quinten

questions.title: Correct supplier template linked on Presta?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Autocheck did not match the file to the template causing the folds to be displaced on the final product.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: Our automatic artwork check did not align the file correctly with the template, resulting in displaced folds on the final product. We can reprint the order with the correct alignment. If a reprint is no longer feasible, we can offer a discount on this order or issue a full refund. Please let us know your preferred option.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork Automatic check Complaint Type: Orientation issue

options.action: Check the borders in InDesign for important elements beyond the purple line.
Check the log in the DTP tab for a green message containing a 'Insufficient safety margins' warning.
Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: 'Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by.

solution.title: Folding
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Reprocess the file correctly to the template, take special care to the safety margins

questions.title: Correct supplier template linked on Presta?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Customers file featured texts/elements that were placed outside of the safe margin. The agent failed to send a warning about this risk.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: The file included text and elements placed outside of the safe margin, and our agent did not issue a warning about this risk. We can reprint the order with a revised file. If a reprint is no longer feasible, we can offer a discount on this order or issue a full refund. Please let us know your preferred option.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Manual Checked Complaint Type: No Warning Sent

solution.title: Folding
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Reprocess the file correctly to the template
Send the order number to Quinten

questions.title: Correct supplier template linked on Presta?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Customers file featured texts/elements that were placed outside of the safe margin. Autocheck failed to send a warning about this risk.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: The file included text and elements placed outside of the safe margin, and our automatic artwork check did not issue a warning about this risk. We can reprint the order with a revised file. If a reprint is no longer feasible, we can offer a discount on this order or issue a full refund. Please let us know your preferred option.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork Automatic check Complaint Type: Insufficient text margins

question.text: What type of order is this?

solution.title: Folding
solution.action: Check with team lead

questions.title: Correct supplier template linked on Presta?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Folding
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Reprocess the file correctly to the template
Pay attention to the affected areas

questions.title: Correct supplier template linked on Presta?
Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Customers file featured texts/elements that were placed outside of the safe margin. A warning was sent so we can not validate the complaint.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: The file included text and elements outside of the safe margin, and a warning was sent regarding this risk. Since the warning was provided, we cannot validate the complaint. As a new customer, we want to address this issue by offering a reprint with an altered file, a discount on the current order, or a full refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know your preferred option.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: The file included text and elements outside of the safe margin, and a warning was sent about this risk. Since the warning was provided, we cannot validate the complaint. As a returning customer, we appreciate your loyalty and can offer a 10% discount on a reprint or a voucher for a future order. Please let us know your preference, and we will make the necessary arrangements.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Cutting margin

options.action: Place the cPDF in the template by 3mm, compare this with the complaint pictures.

question.text: What type of order is this?

solution.title: Folding
solution.action: Check with team lead

questions.title: Correct supplier template linked on Presta?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Folding
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Reprocess the file correctly to the template

questions.title: Correct supplier template linked on Presta?
Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The product was printed and folded correctly and we can not validate the complaint. Our acceptable margins are 3mm.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: The product was printed and folded correctly, and we cannot validate the complaint as our acceptable margins are within 3mm. However, as a gesture of goodwill to a new customer, we can offer a 10% discount on the current order or provide a voucher for a future purchase. Please let us know which option you prefer.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: The product was printed and folded correctly, and we cannot validate the complaint since our acceptable margins are within 3mm. As such, we are unable to offer any compensation for this issue.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill

solution.title: Folding
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Reprint with the same file

questions.title: Correct supplier template linked on Presta?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The supplier has cut/folded incorrectly causing the design to deviate from the folds on the printed product. We can reprint with the same file.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: The supplier has cut or folded the product incorrectly, causing the design to deviate from the intended folds. We can offer a reprint with the same file at no additional cost, provide a discount on the current order, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible due to time constraints. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will take the necessary steps to resolve the issue.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department:Supplier - Quality Wrong Complaint Type: Cutting

options.action:
We allow a deviation of maximum 3mm. Does the deviation from the proof file look bigger than 3mm?
If doubt, follow 'NO' option

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

options.action:
Place the cPDF on the template linked to the DTP tab. 
Compare if the supplier ID on the template matches the supplier ID on the DTP tab.
Unsure how to, send a ticket to artwork_complaints using the macro artwork complaint
